1.<speed=0>|第<%nM_EVENT_NUMBER>回段位戦は 終了いたし:
The <%nM_EVENT_NUMBER>th Dan Championship is|over... We are now on our way to P'gol, a|member of the Millionaire's Society of|
|Raqqaran...

2.<speed=0>|ただいま 大富豪決定戦 開催中のため|段位戦は参加できません: <speed=0>The tournament is now in progress, so you|can't participate in the rankings...<end>

3.<speed=0>|２人以上のパーティを 組んでいないと|仲間と 対戦できません: <speed=0>You have to be in a party of at least two to|play against your friends...<end>

4.仲間を勧誘中のため|ひとりで練習できません。|<bw_break>: I'm still recruiting, so I can practice on my|own...<bw_break>

5.<speed=0>|仲間とパーティを 組んでいるため|ひとりで 練習できません。: <speed=0>I'm in a party with my friends. I can't|practice by myself...<end>

6.<speed=0>|段位戦の 対戦相手を探します。|表示されているルールで ４ゲ: <speed=0>I'm looking for an opponent for the dan|tournament. I'm going to play four games in a|row with the rules shown. Is that okay?<yesno><close>

7.<speed=0>|段位戦のルールが 切り替わりました。|もう一度 やり直してく: <speed=0>The Dan competition rules were changed...|Please start over again.<end>

8.<speed=0>|このルールで 仲間を誘います。|<%nM_NUM_GAME>:
With these rules, you can invite your|friends... <%nM_NUM_GAME> Are you ready to|play a game? If there are fewer than four|
|players, an automated substitute will join...

9.<speed=0>|このルールで ひとりで練習します。|自動操作の対戦相手と <:
With these rules, you can practice by|yourself... I'd like to play a game of|<%nM_NUM_GAME> against an auto-player, if|
|that's okay with you.

10.<speed=0>|大富豪の 基本ルールについて|確認することが できます。|<: <speed=0>We're going to go over the basic rules of the|game...<break>

11.<speed=0>|大富豪の対戦のうち|『段位戦』『なかま対戦』『ひとりで練習』:
I'm going to show you how to play in the|Dafugo tournament. In the Dan-level|tournament, you and four other adventurers|
|are matched up and play by a different set of|rules each day. In Danzaiban, you play four|games in a row, and compete for the total of|
|your winnings. In "Battle of Friends", you|and your friends play by the rules decided by|the leader... However, please note that the|
|number of card points you can get in "Battle|of the Cards" is less than in "Danseki"... If|there aren't enough players in the "Battle of|
|the Cards", an automatic substitute will join|you to make it four... In Hitori-Dango, you|don't get any card points, but you can try|
|out your own rules... You can choose how many|games you'd like to play... You can choose up|to four games... If you want to test your|
|skills by yourself, you can play "Danseki-|sen". If you want to play with your friends,|you can play "Nakama-sen".

12.<speed=0>|各プレイヤーには 階級があり|１ゲーム目は 全員「平民」から:
Each player has a rank, and the first game|begins with all commoners... In the first|game, the player with the three of diamonds|
|is the parent and starts the game. In turn,|each player must play a card that is stronger|than the card on the board, and when all the|
|cards in their hand are played, they win. In|the next game, the player's rank is|determined by the order of their winnings:|
|millionaire, rich, poor, and poorest. In the|second game, before the game begins, you must|exchange cards with a player of another rank.|
|The richest player trades two cards from his|hand for the poorest player's two best cards.|The richest player trades a card from his|
|hand for the poorest player's best card. From|the second game onwards, the poorest player|is the parent and starts the game. When all|
|the games are over, the final ranking is|determined by the sum of the points won.

13.<speed=0>|自分のターンでは カードを出さずに|パスすることもできます。:
On your turn, you can pass without playing a|card... If you play a card, and everyone else|passes, the cards in the field are discarded.|
|When the field runs out, you become the|parent, and you can play a new card of your|choice... You can pass as many times as you|
|like, but you can't pass on the first turn|when you're the parent...

14.<speed=0>|自分のターンの時や カードを選ぶ時の|制限時間は <%nM_:
When it's your turn, or when you choose a|card, you have a time limit of|<%nM_timelimit>... When the time limit|
|expires, the game automatically passes... If|you are the parent and the time limit|expires, your card is automatically played...|
|If you miss the time limit twice in a row,|you'll be penalized and you'll be out of the|game.

15.<speed=0>|カードの強さは 弱い順に並べると|３ ４ ５ ６ ７ ８ ９:
The cards, listed in order of strength from|weakest to strongest, are three, four, five,|six, seven, eight, nine. 10, J, Q, K, A, 2,|
|Joker... Now, if the cards are in different|suits (diamonds, spades, hearts, clubs), but|they have the same number, they have the same|
|strength. However, the Joker can be used as|the strongest card, even if its strength is|reversed by a revolution or an 11-back...

16.<speed=0>|場に１枚 カードが出ている時|より強いカードを １枚出します:
When there is a card in the field, you can|play a stronger card... When there are no|cards in the field, you can play multiple|
|cards of the same number at the same time...|If more than one card is played, the player|on the next turn can only play the same|
|number of cards... The Joker can be used in|place of any other card when more than one|card is played at the same time...

17.<speed=0>|大富豪には 基本ルールのほかに|追加ルールがあります。|<b: <speed=0>In addition to the basic rules, there are|additional rules... Each of these rules can|be found in the "Custom Rules" section...<end>

19.<speed=0>|仲間とパーティを 組んでいるため|段位戦に 参加できません。: <speed=0>Since I'm in a party with my friends, I can't|participate in the Dan competition...<end>

20.<speed=0>|何ゲーム遊びますか？|２ゲーム目からは ゲームを始める前に|:
How many games do you want to play? From the|second game on, before the game begins, you|exchange cards with a player of another|
|rank...||one game|2 games|3 games|4 games|

21.<speed=0>|大富豪決定戦に エントリーされていません。|娯楽島ラッカラン:
You've been entered into the Millionaire's|Championship... P'gol, a member of the|Millionaire's Society of Lackalang, is on his|
|way...

22.<speed=0>|仲間とパーティを 組んでいるため|大富豪決定戦に 参加できま: <speed=0>He's in a party with his friends, so he can|participate in the millionaire's|tournament...<end>

23.<speed=0>|大富豪決定戦の 対戦相手を探します。|表示されているルールで: <speed=0>I'm looking for an opponent for the|millionaire's tournament. We'll play three|games in a row, using the rules shown.<yesno><close>
